bibl.title: City Slicker versus Country Bumpkin: Farmers in the Acharnians of Aristophanes and the Dyskolos of Menander.

bibl.note: Non vidimus. Cf. Gnomon 76 (2004), Bibl. Beilage 4, p. 162.
bibl.seg: STEER C.E., City Slicker versus Country Bumpkin: Farmers in the Acharnians of Aristophanes and the Dyskolos of Menander.
